contents: The International 2016 was played on Dota 2 version 6.88b.
The Silver Armor was removed from the crafting recipe for Jungle Armor in Terraria with the 1.1 patch.
As of December 5, 2012, three downloadable content (DLC) expansions had been released for "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim."
In Dragon Age: Inquisition, Josephine can potentially develop feelings for Blackwall.
Capcom reported a ransomware attack by the Ragnar Locker hacker group on November 2, 2020, which resulted in the theft of 1TB of corporate data and subsequent blackmail.
The "Warrior" class in Dark Souls 1 for PlayStation 3 begins with 11 vitality, 13 strength, and starts at soul level 4.
The EverQuest II original soundtrack was officially released on November 8, 2004.
The DLC "Dragonborn" for Morrowind takes place off the northern coast.
Anita Sandoval was the lead programmer of Project Firebreak, contributing to the creation of CYAN in "Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds" expansion.
The classic version of the shaman class ability Totemic Focus was removed in World of Warcraft patch 5.0.4.
Activision Blizzard announced the creation of a new esports division on October 21, 2015.
The item Mechanical Glove in Terraria had its damage buff effect restricted to only melee weapons in patch 1.2.3.
The set bonus for the Robe in Terraria, when combined with the Magic Hat, was introduced in the 1.2.3 update.
Patch 3.1.0 for World of Warcraft decreased the damage taken in Berserk Stance from 10% to 5%.
The Phosphorescent Pole in Demon's Souls has a weight of 4.0 units.
Vergil's battle quote "It's past your bedtime" is a taunt he directs at the player controlling Nero in Devil May Cry 5 when he delivers a critical strike during combat.
The Terraria update 1.2.3 introduced biome-specific stalactites to the game's underground areas.
The original Groove Coaster game for iOS featured music composed by Hirokazu Koshio (COSIO) and Shohei Tsuchiya.
The 28th track on the official CD release of "Kirby Star Allies: The Original Soundtrack" is titled "Reef Resort."
The Extinction Failsafe Protocol in Horizon Zero Dawn is known as HADES.
In "Demon's Souls," Full Moon Grass sold by Patches costs 1000 souls.
The LEGO part with ID 54093 has dimensions measuring 20 x 56 in studs.
The Ardlings, introduced in D&D's Unearthed Arcana 2022 "Character Origins," are a new species with heads resembling those of various animals.
Koji Haishima is the credited conductor for the music on the Super Mario Galaxy Original Soundtrack: Platinum Version.
The Dota 2 International 2012 was played on game version 6.74.
OBS Studio version 29.1 introduced support for multiple audio tracks in Simple output recording.
The Minecraft Java Beta 1.3 introduced view bobbing in the third-person perspective.
Patch 1.06 for Dark Souls on the original PS3 added 3 Humanities to the Firelink well.
The shaman ability Astral Recall in World of Warcraft was updated to be learned at level 34 in patch 5.0.4.
The patch number sequence in World of Warcraft typically increments by minor version numbers, with Patch 1.11.1 following Patch 1.11.0.
In Dark Souls 1 for the PlayStation 3, the Deprived class starts at Soul Level 6.
The Shaman totem Tremor Totem was adjusted to be learned at level 18 in the World of Warcraft beta on June 15, 2004.
Albert Fink owns a record label/music studio named Magical Melodies in BioShock Infinite.
The Crescent Axe from Demon's Souls inflicts a 55% damage reduction when blocking with it held in two hands.
The Terraria desktop patch that introduced sawmills to the game was released on August 17th, 2011.
Aseprite version 1.3 was released on November 27, 2023.
Koichi Ishii was the lead designer of Seiken Densetsu 3.
The Dota 2 International 2019 was played on game version 7.22f.
The earliest release date for World of Warcraft: Classic Hardcore official servers was on August 24, 2023.
Eddie Gluskin's final words in the "Whistleblower" DLC of the 2013 video game "Outlast" are "We could have been beautiful."
Shinnosuke Tachibana is the Japanese voice actor for Jusis Albarea in "Trails of Cold Steel 1."
The classic version of the Shaman class ability Totemic Focus was removed in World of Warcraft with the release of Patch 5.0.4.
The Dregling Merchant in Demon's Souls sells a Short Spear for 1500 souls.
In the game Transistor, an invitation to Cloudbank's 67th Annual Fashion Week by Sybil Reisz can be found on an OVC terminal in Goldwalk Promenade.
The 12th song on the original Kingdom Hearts I soundtrack is titled "A Walk in Andante" and has a duration of 1:18 minutes.
The Shaman ability Searing Totem was removed from World of Warcraft in patch 7.0.3.
The feature to enable the 'Snap to Grid' option for the brush preview was introduced in Aseprite version v1.3-rc8.
In the video game Outlast, Dr. Richard Trager's final words to Miles Upshur before his death are "I'm not giving up on you."
Adrian Holmes provided the voice for Colonel Drucker in the Medal of Honor (2010) video game.
In the Starfinder RPG, the planet Triaxus is known as "The Wanderer" due to its extreme orbit.
The change in Terraria that reduced the required amount of titanium ore to craft a titanium bar from 5 to 4 was introduced in the Desktop 1.4.1 patch.
In Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice, Lord Takeru's partner is Lady Tomoe.
The patch that reduced the cooldown of Crusader Strike from 10 to 6 seconds in The Burning Crusade expansion of World of Warcraft was released on November 13, 2007.
Alison Mori and Christian Gyrling were promoted to vice presidents of Naughty Dog on December 4, 2020.
Pokémon Diamond and Pearl featured three stages in their original Pokémon contests.
Sawmills were added to Terraria in version 1.0.6.1.
The seventh track on Disc 1 of the Super Mario Galaxy Original Soundtrack Platinum Version is titled "Egg Planet."
Psygnosis Limited was headquartered at Wavertree Technology Park in Liverpool starting in 1995.
In Fire Emblem: Three Houses, Linhardt informs Leonie of a holy weapon at Lake Teutates that can be wielded without a crest.
The dungeon Dire Maul was introduced to "World of Warcraft" on March 7, 2005.
The patch 1.04 for Dark Souls addressed an issue where the Cracked Red Eye Orb was no longer consumed upon a failed invasion connection.
The patch 1.06 for the original Dark Souls decreased the effectiveness of the Hornet Ring.
In Horizon Zero Dawn's Frozen Wilds DLC, CYAN stands for Caldera of Yellowstone Analytic Nexus.
Track 3 on the Mario Kart 64 Greatest Hits soundtrack is titled "Moo Moo Farm."
The official name of Terraria patch 1.4.1 is "Rounding Out the Journey."
The original HeroQuest Game System board game released in North America in 1990 included 3 individual plastic Fimir miniatures.
Foxtel and Microsoft announced a partnership on 20 May 2010 to deliver Foxtel content through Xbox 360's Xbox LIVE service.
Charlie Brooker was the first recipient of the Nebula Award for Best Game Writing.
The Istarelle spear in Demon's Souls has a durability of 800.
Terraria version 1.4.2.1 was released on March 31st, 2021.
Version 1.06 of Dark Souls for the PS3 was updated on October 22, 2012, in North America.
The API function UpdateWorldMapArrow was introduced in World of Warcraft's Patch 5.2.0.
The Japanese voice actor for the character Kiergaard in Ys VIII: Lacrimosa of Dana is Daisuke Kishio.
The 14th song on the official Demon's Souls soundtrack CD, released in 2009, is titled "Maneater."
The patch 1.4.4 in Terraria decreased the Spectre Pickaxe's mining speed from 10 to 8.
The Vesk species in Starfinder originates from the Ghavaniska system.
In "Dante's Inferno" (DMC 3), Vergil's statement to Dante after their first fight with the Yamato emphasizes the importance of strength and power in protection.
The guard stability of the Broken Straight Sword in Dark Souls II is 5.
Track 6 on the Mario Kart 64 Greatest Hits Soundtrack, released in 1997, is titled "Koopa Castle."
Terraria version 1.3.5.2 was released on April 21, 2017.
In the 2013 video game "Outlast," Father Martin's last words before being burned alive were "Now, my son."
Cities: Skylines was released for Google Stadia on May 17, 2022.
The full name of the American live streamer and YouTuber Valkyrae is Rachell Marie Hofstetter.
The International 2014 for Dota 2 was played on version 6.81b.
The Brushwood Helmet in Demon's Souls has a poison resistance value of 6.
Tasha's Cauldron of Everything introduced 22 new subclasses.
Kyarorina was the first person to catch 1 million Pokémon in Pokémon Go.
The secret world seed "Celebrationmk10" was introduced in Terraria patch 1.4.2.3.
In the original BioShock (2007), Jasmine Jolene's corpse is wearing a dress that is white and black.
Terraria desktop version 1.4.3.2 was released on November 24, 2021.
Sony announced the PlayStation 5 in April 2019.
Aseprite v1.3-beta1 was released on May 26th, 2021.
The Space Creature set was added to Terraria in patch 1.2.1.
In Demon's Souls, the Royalty class begins with 4 Half Moon Grass items.
The Puzzling Stone Sword from Dark Souls II has an in-game weight of 2 units.
The Ruins of Lordaeron PvP arena was released in World of Warcraft on May 22, 2007, in the United States.
The 2022 Expert Classes Unearthed Arcana for Dungeons & Dragons introduced the College of Lore as a new Bard subclass.
include the starting Endurance value for the Cleric class in Dark Souls II is 3.
To craft the Partisan weapon with Johannes in the original Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night, players require one Oak and one Steel.
The 10th track on the Sonic Free Riders Original Soundtrack, released in 2010, is titled "Theme of Metal City."
Blake Ritson is the voice actor for the character Griggs in Dark Souls 1 for PlayStation 3.
The Crystal Ring Shield in Dark Souls requires a strength stat of 10 to wield.
Neil Druckmann was promoted to co-president of Naughty Dog on December 4, 2020, alongside Evan Wells.
In patch 5.2.0 of World of Warcraft, the cooldown for the shaman ability Elemental Mastery was reduced to 90 seconds.
Jason Statham is the voice actor for Sergeant Waters in the original Call of Duty game.
Terraria patch 1.3.0.5 was released on July 13th, 2015.
The "Expert Classes" 2022 Unearthed Arcana for Dungeons & Dragons moved the 20th-level features of the classes to the 18th level.
In Morrowind, the book "The Lusty Argonian Maid" can be found in the body of Crassius Curio in Vivec City.
The item "Lance" in Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night can be purchased for 2,700 gold.
Minecraft snapshot 21w11a introduced a change making hoes the correct tool for efficiently breaking moss blocks.
In "Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice," Isshin the Sword Saint declares "Hesitation is defeat" following his victory over Sekiro.
The patch 1.4.4 in Terraria lowered the cost of the Leather Whip from 15 gold to 10 gold.
The Partisan weapon in the original version of Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night for PC is dropped by an enemy named Lance Armor.
Patch 5.0.5a for World of Warcraft was released in the United States on September 13, 2012.
The 21st track on "The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky The Animation" Original Soundtrack CD is titled "Secret Green Passage."
The Game Boy was produced for a total of 14 years.
The cannibal in the "Whistleblower" DLC of the 2013 video game "Outlast" is named Frank Manera.
The Warrior starting class in Dark Souls II begins with an Iron Parma shield.
Sargeras convinced most of the Eredar to join the Burning Legion around 13,000 years before the Dark Portal's creation.
The LEGO part with ID 35775 is known to come in the color Pearl Gold.
The official soundtrack for "Spyro: Enter the Dragonfly" was released on November 5, 2002.
The Tiki Totem item in Terraria was introduced in the 1.2 desktop patch.
The original Seiken Densetsu 3 soundtrack was released across 3 CDs.
In the video game Outlast 2, Father Loutermilch sings the song "Be Careful Little Eyes."
The voice actor for the character Alvina in the game Dark Souls is Ève Karpf.
The 10th track on disc 2 of the "Sen no Kiseki IV - The End of Saga -" original soundtrack is titled "Break In."
Patch 0.7 in the beta of World of Warcraft increased the damage of the spell Crusader Strike and changed it to an instant cast spell.
The Blue Flame in Dark Souls II has a durability of 60.
The release price of the 2019 "Kirby Star Allies: The Original Soundtrack" was 6480 Japanese Yen.
The Fume Sword in Dark Souls II has a counter strength value of 120.
Naughty Dog's technology head Christian Gyrling left the company in October 2023 after 17 years, with Travis McIntosh succeeding him.
Minecraft beta 1.4_01 was released on April 5th, 2011.
The Puzzling Stone Sword in Dark Souls II has a durability of 60.
The Terraria version that raised the server player limit to 255 was released on June 2nd, 2011.
Jodelle Ferland provided the voice for the Little Sisters in "BioShock 2" (2010).
